content: this is a summary of a civil case in the alytaus district court the case involves a matrimonial property dispute between two parties nj and aj who are in a community property arrangement the court has determined that the property which includes a dwelling house garage and engineering structures should be divided between the parties nj is assigned 1132 parts of the property while aj is assigned the remaining 1132 parts aj is ordered to pay nj compensation for their share of the property as well as burial costs the court has also ordered aj to pay the costs of the proceedings
